snippet.title: Monster Hunter Stories - Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Switch, PC, PS4
snippet.description:
The first installment of the Monster Hunter Stories series is back and coming to Nintendo Switch, PC, and PlayStation 4! Become a Monster Rider and hatch, raise, and battle with your favorite Monsties in this epic RPG adventure. 

Monster Hunter Stories launches on Nintendo Switch, PC, and PS4 in Summer 2024 with refined graphics, a new Museum mode, and content previously released only in Japan. Ride on!

#MHStories #MonsterHunter

Japanese https://youtu.be/kq5ZY4THvfE
French https://youtu.be/ajyW8d-73nc
Italian https://youtu.be/1BcI6QM4AV0
German https://youtu.be/B_C0Npklbss
Spanish https://youtu.be/x3MIi3AP_nY
Polish https://youtu.be/s-CQMCac8Kk
Brazilian Portuguese https://youtu.be/q_PcvRJzcZw
Traditional Chinese https://youtu.be/PveA_-O-RI0
Simplified Chinese https://youtu.be/OT7hJ6IVVv0
Korean https://youtu.be/ZsipO9jGXzU

https://discord.gg/capcom
https://www.facebook.com/monsterhunter
